name: Forever In Love Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Fruity Florals..Key Notes: Green Pear, Gardenia, Cedarwood..Fragrance Description: This swoon-worthy fruity-floral fragrance with green pear and gardenia is like that first flutter, opening the heart and setting you on a new path, every petal of the gardenia flower is in full bloom, brightened by green pear and Italian mandarin, surrounded by jasmine, rose petals, and cedarwood...About the Bottle: An oversized bow, perfectly imperfect. The LoveShackFancy perfume bottle references founder Rebecca Hessel Cohenu2019s lifelong love of bows and ribbons with a sculptural bow top that appears tied and tightened by hand. The hot pink and green Blooming Heirloom print is a signature design chosen from over 2,000 in the LoveShackFancy print and lace library to decorate the blush pink-colored bottle, a softly curved antique-inspired vessel carved with scalloping on top and a ring of rope on the bottom. Once finished, its spray top is removable so the bottle can be upcycled as a bud vase...About the Fragrance: Itu2019s your first love. Pretty in pink. Letu2019s add a bow. Forever in Love is a vibrant floral with green pear and gardenia and hints of cedarwood. Unapologetically feminine and full of life, looking for the bright side and finding it, again and again. Created with love and a youthful, fresh energy by perfumer Honorine Blanc...
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Citric Acid, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Isoeugenol, Limonene, Linalool...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-The spirit of LoveShackFancy is apparent upon firstu2014and second and thirdu2014whiff. .-Apply on pulse points to wrists, neck, and behind the ears..-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. .-This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with the Love Shack Fancy Forever in Love Eau de Parfum! Itu2019s literally a dream in a bottle. If youu2019re anything like me and adore light, fresh fragrances, this one is an absolute must-have.  It belongs to the Florals family and has this perfect fruity-floral blend thatu2019s justu2026 wow. The key notes of green pear, gardenia, and cedarwood make it feel like a burst of fresh air every time you spritz it on. Seriously, the green pear adds a crisp, refreshing touch, while the gardenia brings this lush, blooming garden vibe. And that hint of cedarwood? It grounds the scent perfectly, making it sophisticated yet playful.  The light intensity is something I particularly love. Itu2019s not overpowering at all, making it perfect for everyday wear. Whether youu2019re heading to brunch with the girls or on a romantic date night, this scent adds just the right amount of allure without being too strong.  Now, letu2019s take a moment to appreciate the bottle! The hot pink and green Blooming Heirloom print is so quintessentially LoveShackFancy. The blush pink bottle with its antique-inspired design and scalloped edges is just beyond gorgeous.   Forever in Love is all about capturing that youthful, fresh energy. It feels like your first love - innocent, exhilarating, and full of promise. Created by the talented perfumer Honorine Blanc, itu2019s a celebration of femininity and positivity.  Ladies, this fragrance is pure magic. Get ready to fall head over heels for Love Shack Fancy Forever in Love. Itu2019s pretty, itu2019s pink, and itu2019s perfection in a bottle. ud83dudc95u2728

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Love Shack Fancy Forever in Love Perfume is a captivating and delightful fragrance that beautifully blends fruity and floral notes to create an enchanting olfactory experience. This scent is a celebration of love, encapsulating the joy and vibrancy that love brings into our lives.  The initial burst of fruity notes is invigorating, with a burst of fresh and juicy fruits that instantly uplift your spirits. As the fragrance settles, the floral undertones emerge, adding a layer of elegance and sophistication to the composition. The interplay between the fruity and floral elements creates a harmonious and balanced scent profile.  What sets Forever in Love apart is its ability to evoke feelings of happiness and romance. It's a fragrance that feels youthful and vibrant, making it a perfect choice for both daytime wear and evenings out. The longevity of this perfume is commendable, ensuring that the scent lingers throughout the day or night without fading away.  The bottle design is as charming as the fragrance itself, with its romantic and vintage-inspired aesthetic. It's a fragrance that not only smells divine but also looks stunning on your vanity.  In conclusion, Love Shack Fancy's Forever in Love Perfume is a fruity floral-scented masterpiece that captures the essence of love in a bottle. Its versatility, longevity, and overall charm make it a must-have for anyone seeking a fragrance that embodies joy, romance, and timeless beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the brand, but this perfume is pricey for what it is and the packaging. The bottle topper is plastic and looks like it was assembled quickly or cracked in transit. Otherwise, the bottle is gorgeous per brand. The actual juice isn't anything new or refined. It's a pleasant scent. Slightly cloying to the point of making the stomach turn. Perfume is subjective and depends on personal body chemistry, so if you like fruity florals, this may be a good buy if you're a fan of the brand. If you're looking for a designer experience, you may want to go with another brand's perfume.
